ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:33:03 [Issue ID 4000-507764] urn:comicvine:4000-507764 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:46:13. [Issue ID 1514508]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Street Fighter monthly comics are back! Gearing up for the release of Street Fighter V in 2016, UDON launches an all-new monthly comic book series that will pack in more adrenaline, more battles, and more characters than ever before! A new era for the undisputed king of fighting games begins here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Story Cover A | Genzoman | 1 | B | Ultra Jam Puzzle Cover B (1 of 12) | Jeffrey 'Chamba' Cruz | 4 | C | Blank Sketch Cover C | None | 5 | D | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover D | Long Vo | 6 | E | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Street Fighter V Game Cover E | Joe Ng | 7 | F | 1:40 Retailer Incentive Cover F | Bengus | 8 | G | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Foil Stamp Cover G | None | 9 | H | Second Printing Cover | ? | 3 | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 2 | Notes:
Cover B is part one of a twelve part connecting cover image made up of all the Ultra Jam Puzzle covers for issues #1-12. The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover D is a homage of the cover of Marvel Super Heroes Secret Wars #8.
